newsitem.title: POLAND: NBP drains PLN 1.07 bln from Polish money market.
newsitem.headline: NBP drains PLN 1.07 bln from Polish money market.

text.p: The National Bank of Poland drained 1.07 billion zlotys from the market through a reverse NBP-bill repurchase auction after banks bid to place 1.14 billion with the central bank, the NBP said.
The bank drained the market for three days at a maximum rate of 21.55 percent against the last one-day maximum rate at 21.50 percent.
The maximum accepted rates for seven and 14 days were flat at 21.63 percent and 21.65 percent respectively.
